DublinCoreMetadata.Title: Suppression Permission Country Medium Status Business Data Standard
DublinCoreMetadata.Subject: IBM Common schema for the Suppression Permission Country Medium Status Business Data Standard
DublinCoreMetadata.Creator: kathert@us.ibm.com
DublinCoreMetadata.Description: IBM Common schema for instantiating the Suppression Permission Country Medium Status Business Data Standard

IBM_GWA_Metadata.Keywords: BDS, business data standards, data element, Suppression Permission Country Medium Status

BDS_CommonElements.BDS_Definition: The Suppression Permission Country Medium Status defines each Suppression Permission Medium (a communication type) that is used to contact a customer for all countries where IBM operates business. Each Suppression Permission Country Medium Status defines either opt-in (Permission) or opt-out (Suppression) data privacy laws for each Suppression Permission Medium in every Country.
BDS_CommonElements.BDS_AV_Notes: Allow only values of opt-in or opt-out. Opt-in means permission is required before communication to an individual. Opt-out means permission is not required first and may be assumed.Scroll to far right of page for values
